LanguageTemplates.Workflowfy_Begin_Template: in order to make the process model a workflow, it has to be preprocessed
LanguageTemplates.Workflowfy_End_Template: after workflowfy this process model, the textual description can be generated
LanguageTemplates.Polygon_Begin_Template: there are some procedures need to be finished sequentially
LanguageTemplates.Polygon_End_Template: the above sequential part is finished
LanguageTemplates.BondPlace_Begin_Template: one of following paths needs to be finished
LanguageTemplates.BondTransition_Begin_Template: all of following paths are processing at the same time
LanguageTemplates.Loop_Begin_Template: after above paths are finished, there is a loop path which can happen depending on the running conditions
LanguageTemplates.Loop_End_Template: the above loop path is finished
LanguageTemplates.RigidPlace_Begin_Template: there is a region which allows for different execution paths listed as following
LanguageTemplates.RigidPlace_End_Template: one of the above path is finished
LanguageTemplates.RigidTransition_Begin_Template: there is a region which allows for different execution paths listed as following
LanguageTemplates.RigidTransition_End_Template: all of the above paths are finished
LanguageTemplates.RigidOtherBehavior_Begin_Template: there are some behaviors which can also occur
LanguageTemplates.RigidOtherBehavior20_Template: the rigion can also begins when
